# dukeslides

![lifecycle: deprecated](https://img.shields.io/badge/lifecycle-deprecated-orange "Lifecycle: deprecated")
There will be no further development of `library(dukeslides)`.  This package has been deprecated in favor of using the following teachniques and packages:

- [`library(xaringan)`](https://github.com/yihui/xaringan)
- [`library(xaringanthemer)`](https://github.com/gadenbuie/xaringanthemer)
- [`library(xaringanExtra)`](https://github.com/gadenbuie/xaringanExtra)
- [story Remark Themes](https://story.xaprb.com/slides/adirondack/#2)

**Learn More**:  https://rfun.library.duke.edu/portfolio/slides_workshop/
